title: My Lol Account was stolen
body: The Lol account that was stolen is this account if you are reading this i need you to contact a riot employee to shutdown this account. Someone changed the authentication the email and the password sso if your reading this please report an employee to find who stole my account

replies.body:
Hey! 

Please submit a support ticket to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). In your report, use the subject line "Unrecoverable Account" from the email address that you used to sign up for your account. Make sure to provide us with the requested information about the account you are trying to recover. From there we will work with you to verify ownership of the account.
Katey, off topic, but do you know what's going on with Riot Orphyre's account??
That post did not come from the Rioter himself,  please disregard anything said by the account for the time being.

Yeah, I was going to say, https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Riot%20Orphyre  is obviously hacked.

Should get him disabled ASAP.

I appreciate the heads up. 

The post was not made by the Rioter himself, and I've removed the post and myself and a few other Rioters are aware of the issue. I'd like to clarify that none of what was posted is accurate information and should be discarded.
I'll open a support ticket for you.
